description.@en: Admittedly, it’s hard to really care about anything. If it weren’t for all this constant pain in my back, I’d likely spend my days in bed.

data.notes: Grievous Injuries must undergo a successful Perform Surgery within twenty-four hours of suffering it, or else a character gains its related Permanent Injury.

effect.@en: Whenever you Use Laudanum, you must use two instead of one. Using additional laudanum in this instance has no negative effects.
